function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sending data periodically to the cloud","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases via iot devices in large buildings or campuses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of wifi technology in public and private buildings for ieq monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of vlan intranet to separate ieq monitoring traffic from mainstream internet traffic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mqtt protocol for communication in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ieee802.11 and ieee802.1q as standards for wifi technology and vlan","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq concentrator holding the mqtt broker for connecting all ieq sensor nodes in the area","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues with ieq sensor nodes triggering the reset procedure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost opensource hardware may result in lower reliability and accuracy of ieq data.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes anywhere in the premises may lead to incomplete or uneven coverage of monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wifi connectivity for ieq measurements may lead to data transmission issues and interruptions in monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate power supply to the ieq concentrator may result in data loss or system downtime.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wifi coverage may limit the deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes, leading to incomplete monitoring of certain areas within the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient energy efficiency measures for smart sensors may result in higher energy consumption and reduced autonomy of the monitoring system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring indoor air quality is crucial for avoiding the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Configurable quantity and types of sensors may lead to inadequate coverage for monitoring key parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity in programming the monitoring platform may lead to operational errors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sensor buses spi and i2c increases complexity and potential for technical failures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in sensor precision and accuracy for temperature, humidity, and air quality measurements.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of lower-cost sensors for humidity and air quality measurements may compromise data accuracy and reliability.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sensor types and buses may introduce compatibility issues and data inconsistencies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher cost of certain sensors may limit widespread deployment, reducing coverage and accuracy of environmental monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manufacturing cost and process may limit scalability and affordability of the monitoring system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost of components may be prohibitively high for large-scale production, reducing accessibility of the prototype","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy consumption of the smart ieq sensor node may be unsustainable for long-term operation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustainability issues related to iot systems may not be well understood by students and staff, leading to suboptimal usage and environmental impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible overconsumption of energy by the iot devices leading to increased operational costs.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient use of battery capacity due to inaccurate dimensioning based on energy consumption data.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the sustainability impact of the deployed iot system among students and staff.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High power consumption from wifi communications","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability to software changes due to foss technologies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for data security breaches during mqtt communication","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralization of the ieq monitoring system may lead to a single point of failure for the entire system, increasing the risk of widespread impact if the central system fails.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Alarms are generated when nodes are not working properly, indicating a risk of delayed identification and resolution of node malfunctions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data captured from smart ieq sensor nodes is stored in text files, posing a risk of data security and integrity.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination of ieq concentrators and monitoring system due to physical interaction with multiple users","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cloud connectivity may limit the ability to detect and respond to contagious disease outbreaks in real-time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of data in text files may pose a security risk, leading to unauthorized access and potential data breaches","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq sensor nodes connected to the internet potentially vulnerable to cyberattacks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cloud services accessed from anywhere in the internet increase risk of data breaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide distribution of smart ieq sensor nodes increases risk of spreading contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high occupancy in the faculty building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the staff office","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene practices in the laboratory and classroom","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in co2 concentration depending on sensor location","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation during door and window opening","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq monitoring system testing without considering infectious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation due to open windows","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in temperature conditions in the laboratory depending on location","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
